creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two panels sewn together; indigo, white, green, yellow, brown, purple, orange, red and light blue; geometric ikat stripes; some blue and white ikat stripes woven:  "ISOY DE TOTONICAPAN"
title: Perraje
